content: Wow. What is more high risk then true, honest love. This makes me realize how many of us spend so much time keeping up a false identity that maybe we begin to believe it ourselves. I feel like I’ve been smacked and told “Wake up you idiot “. I guess it’s good when a writer causes you to stop and look in the mirror, we just might not like what or who we see. Thank you for making me look and for an awesome work.
